item.title: 2015-12 - December partner offers reminder
item.dc:creator: awallmeyer@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded: Your MinnPost membership allows you to claim free tickets to great events via our monthly partner offers program. We just launched our December offers – see what’s available and claim your tickets now!

item.dc:creator: claire.radomski@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: It's our spring member drive! Help MinnPost this week: take our members-only survey or make an additional gift today. Thank you!

It's MinnPost's Spring Member Drive!

Become a member today to help MinnPost grow in 2016. Thank you!

Become a member today during our Spring Member Drive. Thank you!

Your support will help MinnPost grow in 2016. Thank you!

item.title: Spring 2016 Drive - Nonmembers #5

Offer ends with our Spring Member Drive tomorrow. Give today!

item.content:encoded:
MinnRoast is Friday, April 15!

Buy your tickets now to see our featured guests poke fun at each other and the state of the state we all love.

item.title: Summer 2016 Drive - nonmembers #3 (view)

This drive only, we'll send you a pair of MinnPost pint glasses
with your donation of $10/month or more.  
Thank you!

This is your last chance to receive pair of limited-edition MinnPost pint glasses
with your donation of $10/month or more.

item.title: MinnPost Quiz Live!
item.dc:creator: claire.radomski@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
Tickets now available for MinnPost Quiz Live!

Join MinnPost and the Minneapolis Foundation for a pub trivia-style event at Modist Brewing on Oct. 19 at 6:00 p.m. Buy your tickets now!

item.title: Fall Member Drive 2017 - DMC1
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded:
Insightful news. Engaged citizens. A stronger Minnesota.

Your member support makes it possible. Thank you!

Will you help spread the word about MinnPost by sharing on Facebook?

item.title: Fall Member Drive 2017 - DMN1
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded:
Insightful news. Engaged citizens. A stronger Minnesota.

MinnPost's nonprofit newsroom relies on member support.

> > > Help kick off our Fall Member Drive by making a donation right now > > >

item.title: Fall Member Drive 2017 - DMN2
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded:
Informed debate can’t happen without quality information. That’s why MinnPost is vital to the future of Minnesota.

Will you support our nonprofit newsroom by becoming a member today?

item.title: Fall Member Drive 2017 - DMN3
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded:
MinnPost’s nonprofit newsroom is fueled by support from readers like you.

>>> Join now during our Fall Member Drive >>>

item.title: Fall Member Drive 2017 - DMN4
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded:
MinnPost is here with insightful news and expert analysis, so you can engage with the challenges facing Minnesota.

>>> Support our nonprofit newsroom by becoming a member >>>

item.title: Fall Member Drive 2017 - DMC2
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded:
Your member support makes MinnPost possible. Thank you!

During our Fall Member Drive, you can help in TWO ways:

  • Spread the word about MinnPost on Facebook >>>
  • Make an additional gift above and beyond your membership >>>

item.title: Fall Member Drive 2017 - DMC3
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded:
The Fall Member Drive ends on Thursday!

As a current member, there are two ways you can help us hit our goal:

>>> Spread the word about MinnPost on Facebook >>>
>>> Make an additional gift above and beyond your membership >>>


Thank you for supporting MinnPost.

item.title: Year-End 2017 DM#2
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded:
MATCHING FUNDS ALERT: $28,000 on the table!

Donate to MinnPost right now, and your gift will be matched dollar-for-dollar, up to $1,000, by News Match.

item.title: 2016 Anniversary Party Viewport
item.dc:creator: claire.radomski@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
Celebrate MinnPost's Ninth Anniversary on Nov. 15

Tickets are still available for our post-election conversation with Sen. Al Franken and policy wonk Norm Ornstein. Join us!

item.title: GTTM Day 2016
item.dc:creator: claire.radomski@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
There has never been a more important time to show your support  for high-quality, independent journalism.

This Give to the Max Day, please consider supporting MinnPost.

item.title: EOY DM #1
item.dc:creator: claire.radomski@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
Fact-based, independent journalism has never been more important.

Support MinnPost with a gift today.

item.title: Earth Journal Final

Today is the final day of MinnPost's critical environmental campaign.

Give now to keep our coverage strong in 2017.

item.title: 2017 Spring Drive
item.dc:creator: claire.radomski@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
Our nonprofit newsroom depends on reader support.

Please give today.

MATCHING FUNDS

Support our nonprofit newsroom and your year-end donation will be matched dollar-for-dollar, up to $1,000, thanks to News Match.

item.title: Super Bowl Ticket Auction
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded:
MinnPost is auctioning two tickets to Super Bowl LII and the 52 Live Pre-Game Party.

Make your bid by 4 p.m. today!

>>> LEARN DETAILS & MAKE YOUR BID >>>

item.title: Spr18 DM1 - Nonmembers
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded:
Read local news. Support local news.

Support MinnPost's nonprofit newsroom at $10+/month and you can get a limited-edition scarf as a thank you gift.

>>> DONATE NOW >>>

item.title: Spr18 DM1 - Members
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded:
Thank you for reading and supporting local news.

Your member support makes MinnPost possible.

Will you make an additional donation during our Spring Drive?

item.title: Spr18 DM2 - Nonmembers
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded:
Hey look, no paywall.

As a mission-driven nonprofit, we provide our local news coverage to all Minnesotans for free. That's only possible thanks to member support.

>>> Donate during the Spring Member Drive >>>

item.title: Spr18 DM3 - Nonmembers
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded: If everyone reading this message right now made a donation, we'd not only hit our goal of 125 donations for the Spring Member Drive, we'd hit our goal for the whole year. Support MinnPost.

item.title: Spr18 DM4 - Nonmembers
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded:
2 days left!

You can put us over the top for the current drive and keep our local news coverage going strong.

Support MinnPost Now

item.title: Spr18 DM5 - Nonmembers
item.dc:creator: tcurl@minnpost.com
item.content:encoded:
LAST DAY of the Spring Member Drive!

You can help us hit our goal and keep our local news coverage going strong.

Donate Now

item.title: MinnRoast 2018 - DM1
item.dc:creator: tanner.curl@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
You won't want to miss MinnRoast on April 27th.

In addition to big political names — Dayton, Mondale, Daudt, Klobuchar, Ellison — this year's show will feature the talents of real-deal performers, like Sally Wingert and Tyler Michaels.

>>> Tickets start at $14 >>>

item.title: FAN Club Vote
item.dc:creator: claire.radomski@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: As a Platinum member, you can vote in this month's FAN Club to award free advertising to a local nonprofit. Voting ends Wednesday, Dec. 7 at 11:59 p.m. Vote now!
